title: Want to find 1967 underground newspaper from Den Haag, Holland, named IETS
content:
When doing research for a book I’m writing on typography, I ran across a 1967 underground newspaper from Den Haag named IETS. Does anyone know anyone who was connected with this publication or where I could get a good picture of a cover? Thanks much!!

David Amdur, Professor  
Department of Visual Communications  
Brown College  
1440 Northland Drive  
Mendota Heights, MN 55120  
USA

 [‹ KABK](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225733/http:/typophile.com/node/17176 "Go to previous forum topic") [Printing In melbourne, VIC, AUST ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225733/http:/typophile.com/node/17147 "Go to next forum topic")
author: D_Amdur
